devdoc.details: Token transfers may be locked and unlocked by the contract Owner

balanceOf(address,uint256).details: See {IERC1155-balanceOf}. Requirements: - `account` cannot be the zero address.

balanceOfBatch(address[],uint256[]).details: See {IERC1155-balanceOfBatch}. Requirements: - `accounts` and `ids` must have the same length.

lock().details: By locking the contract, token owners are prevented from transferring their tokensWhen the contract is locked, mint and burn functions are still permitted

params.amount: The supply to be minted for that token id
params.to: Receiving address for the new token id

params.amounts: Array of supplies to be minted for the token ids
params.ids: Array of token ids to mint
params.to: Receiving address for the new token ids

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

params.newuri: The new token URI for all tokens minted

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

unlock().details: By unlocking the contract, token owners are allowed to transfer their tokens

uri(uint256).details: See {IERC1155MetadataURI-uri}. This implementation returns the same URI for *all* token types. It relies on the token type ID substitution mechanism https://eips.ethereum.org/EIPS/eip-1155#metadata[defined in the EIP]. Clients calling this function must replace the `\{id\}` substring with the actual token type ID.

Locked().notice: Emitted when the locking status is changed to locked.

Unlocked().notice: Emitted when the locking status is changed to unlocked.

isLocked().notice: Public function for viewing the contract's locked status (true or false)

lock().notice: Owner function to lock the contract

mint(address,uint256,uint256,bytes).notice: Owner function for minting a new token id

mintBatch(address,uint256[],uint256[],by.notice: Owner function for batch minting new token ids

setURI(string).notice: Owner function to unlock the contract

unlock().notice: Owner function to unlock the contract
